history: I wanted to join Shinra's Elite Corps, to become a SOLDIER. The final test was to accompany Sephiroth to Gaia on a reconnaissance mission. We found a lost young girl, Ifalna. Sephiroth decided to take her to the nearest doctor. I finally remembered!!

map_messages.01: You cannot go in that direction.
map_messages.04: Remember you must take Ifalna to her destination.

play_again: Congratulations, you have pass game. Do you want to play again?
no_items_message: There is no items to collect.
begin_fight: Cloud: Quick, let's finish him off!!
browser_not_support: Your browser does not support audio/video playback.

content_about.title: ABOUT
content_about.mainContent: A few years ago when I started working as a programmer, my favorite game was Final Fantasy VII. Now, a long time later, I've written this code to adapt and utilize Vue 3 and bring this demo to completion, you can play a game if you want.
content_about.disclaimer: Disclaimer: I've made this project without any economic interest and on a personal basis, as a technical demo of the capabilities of Vue 3 technology, and my small tribute to the ffvii world.
content_about.repositoryLinkText: View the source code repository here

content_help.title: HELP
content_help.mouse: Mouse: You can use mouse to click elements
content_help.keyboard: Keyboard: You can use direction keyboard on MAP, and ESC to access to menu
content_help.pad: Pad: You can use pad on screen click buttons for some actions
